title: midi.out
description: The `midi.out` object sends "cooked" MIDI messages (Note On/Off, Control Change, Program Change, Aftertouch, Pitch Bend) to a connected MIDI device, unlike `midiout` which handles raw data. It accepts symbol data types, values, and a channel, with an optional argument or right inlet to set the MIDI channel (0 for omni). An `-ext` flag or `ext` message can be used to direct output solely to its outlet.
